youtube.title: The Biology of Period Cramps: Understanding Dysmenorrhea
youtube.description: Discover the scientific process behind menstrual cramping (dysmenorrhea). This video explains how the uterus contracts to shed its lining, causing the discomfort many experience during their cycle. Learn more about your body and reproductive health.
